Title: 365 Days
Writer: Tomasz Klimala (screenplay by), Tomasz Mandes (screen story by), Barbara Bialowas (screen story by), Blanka Lipinska (screen story by), Blanka Lipinska (based on the novel by)
Actors: Anna Maria Sieklucka, Michele Morrone, Bronislaw Wroclawski, Otar Saralidze
Plot: Massimo is a member of the Sicilian Mafia family and Laura is a sales director. She does not expect that on a trip to Sicily trying to save her relationship, Massimo will kidnap her and give her 365 days to fall in love with him.
